question: The Water Technology and Environment Control (WATEC) conference was held in which country?
explanation: The Jal Shakti Minister Shri Gajendra Singh Shekhawat represented India at the WATEC Conference that was held in Israel. The Water Technology and Environment Control (WATEC) conference helps to get updates on technologies related to water and environmental management. Several countries participated in the conference showcasing their revolutionary technologies and solutions.Israel is considered as world hero in terms of water management. The country treats and reuses 80% of its sewage water for agriculture.
